revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix

|cpu1chip1 = Intel Atom;C2358; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = x86-64 |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- x86-64 Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 1.7 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = Serial(SPI) |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L6406EMI-12G; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = mSATA SSD |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Intel;SSDMCEAW080A4; |flash2size = 80 GiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5TQ2G63FFR-PBC; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |ram2type = DDR3 |ram2type1 = DIMM |ram2spd = <!-- 3400,3333,3300,3200,3100,3000,2800,2666,2600,2400,2133,2000,1866,1600,1066,1333,800 --> |ram2size = 4 GiB |ram2chip = Samsung;; |ram2_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1543; |eth3chip = Intel;WGI210AT; |eth4chip = Intel;WGI210AT; |lan_ports = 6 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = D8:CB:8A
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = Grub;0.97;; |stockos = Linux;2.6.38.7;Barracuda NG Firewall 6.2.1-057;
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe, USB 2.0, SATA 3.0, mSATA |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 4 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = 2 |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 19 |pwr_amp_dc = 3.42 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, RJ45 console,, (19200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = VGA, RTC w/ battery, power switch, fan, buzzer, heatsink, metal case |addchip = LPC Super I/O IC;Nuvoton;NCT5533D;;1;,,, 256K SPI Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT25256B;;1;,,, PCIe Clock Generator;Silicon Labs;SI52138;;1;,,, 3V 16M-bit SPI Serial Flash;Winbond;W25Q16DV;;2;,,, 3V RS232 Transceiver;Texas Instruments;MAX3243C;;1;,,, PCI-Express Gen 4 Quad Fanout Buffer;Skyworks;Si53154;;1;,,, 2A Very Low Dropout Regulator w/ Enable;Semtech;SC4215A;;2;,,, 3A Ultra Low Dropout Linear Regulator;Niko-Sem;GS7103-A;;4;,,, Hex Inverter with Schmitt Trigger Input;Diodes Inc;74LVC14A;;1;,,, 2D Video Graphic Adapter w/ PCIe Interface;Aspeed Tech;AST1400;;1;,,, 30V N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha&Omega Semiconductor;AO4468;;2;,,, 30V P-Channel MOSFET;Alpha&Omega Semiconductor;AO4413;;1;,,, Single-Phase Synchronous Buck Regulator;On Semi;NCP81109E;;3;,,, High Current Synchronous Buck Converter;On Semi;NCP3232N;;4;,,, 3A 3MHz Synchronous Buck Regulator;On Semi;NCP1593B;;1;,,, Synchronous PWM Switching Converter;On Semi;NCP3170;;2;,,, 30V 22A N-Channel MOSFET;On Semi;FDMS7698;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = 192.168.200.200 |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = ngf1r3wall |manuf = Micro-Star |manuf_model = MS-S1401 |manuf_rev = V1.0 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = USA
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "MS-S1401VER:1.0", "MICRO-STAR" and "Model MS-S1401" :are silkscreened under the heatsink.
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Intel Atom]] C2358 @1.7GHz (Dual-Core) *Memory: 4GB (DDR3 DIMM) RAM *Storage: 8MB (CMOS) Serial Flash, 80GB Intel mSATA SSD *PCI: 1x PCIe, 1x mSATA slots *Network: 6x Gigabit Ethernet ports *USB: 4x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 19V, 3.42A via barrel
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:Barracuda CloudGen Firewall X300 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Barracuda CloudGen Firewall X300 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom File:Barracuda CloudGen Firewall X300 PCI Net Board Top.jpeg|PCI Network Board Top File:Barracuda CloudGen Firewall X300 PCI Net Board Bottom.jpeg|PCI Network Board Bottom File:Barracuda CloudGen Firewall X300 LED Board Top.jpeg|LED Board Top File:Barracuda CloudGen Firewall X300 LED Board Bottom.jpeg|LED Board Bottom File:Barracuda CloudGen Firewall X300 Internal.jpeg|Internal View </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
